text: |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Marian Place/The Oval/Emma Street| |Area [ha]|4.38| |Ward|Bethnal Green West| |PTAL [2031]|4-6a| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality (part of the site) z London View Management Framework (view 8A.1 – Westminster Pier to St Paul’s Cathedral) z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (London’s Canals, adjacent to the site) z Publicly Accessible Open Space (The Oval) z Local Employment Location z Conservation Area (Regents Canal, part of site; Hackney Road, part of site) z Statutory Listed Buildings (2 Pritchards Road, Grade II; 444 Hackney Road, Grade II, adjacent to site; 446-450 Hackney Road, Grade II, adjacent to site)|
